//: Suitable for kids' unisex backpacks, lunchboxes, graphic tees, and similar items.

text.text: It's covered in shooting stars and glowing comets, the kind that people used to wish upon.
There's a big, confident-looking sun wearing sunglasses looking back at you from its surface.
As you examine it, its cartoon owl mascot stares back at you with big, inscrutable eyes.
It's covered in tiny paw prints, like an untrained pet left muddy tracks all over it.
Various pieces of fruit with legs and arms beam up at you with smiling faces, as if inviting you to eat them.
An old cartoon character smiles jauntily from its surface, celebrating their recently renewed return to television.  The TV stations shutting down stopped that nostalgia grab before it started.

//: Suitable for boys' backpacks, lunchboxes, graphic tees, and similar items.

text.text: It's decorated with a big cartoon dinosaur, crushing a helpless car beneath it.
It's emblazoned with the logo of a superhero who was always stopping the end of the world from happening.  Unfortunately, like most heroes, he was fictional.
It features a colorful rocket ship fearlessly blasting off into an unexplored, starry cosmos.
It's got a space-themed design, astronauts orbiting helplessly in the void among asteroids and alien planets with rings.
It features a rebellious skull and crossbones, like the merciless black flag of a pirate.
It's patterned like an aged treasure map, complete with dotted lines and an X marking the spot.
It's covered in rampaging monster trucks, leaving criss-crossing trails of muddy tire tracks in their wake.
There's a sporty pattern of sneakers, soccer balls, and championship trophies covering it.

//: Suitable for girls' backpacks, lunchboxes, graphic tees, and similar items.

text.text: Images of glowing magic wands and small fairies shedding pixie dust from their wings cover its surface.
Little cartoon ballerinas pose gracefully on a pastel background.
Little pink hearts and sparkles decorate the space around a single large, central red heart.  A big sharp arrow has pierced straight through it, coming out the other side.
It's covered in unicorns that prance under various rainbows arcing between white, fluffy clouds.
Bright flowers cover it, sprouting from tangles of long green vines that converge on a central, half-hidden door.
It's covered in cartoon kittens playfully competing over balls of yarn.  One kitten teeters precariously as if it's about to fall off the edge of the drawing.
